title: Nasa astronauts' moon mission likely to be delayed
description: The mission to the far side of the Moon and back will likely be postponed after problems with were spotted with its rocket, a Nasa official said.
content:
Nasa has said that its early March launch day for its highly anticipated lunar mission would almost definitely be pushed back, after the agency spotted problems with the system's helium flow in safety checks.
On Friday, the space agency said that its... [1946 chars]

title: Police responder to 2017 London Bridge attack sacked for ‘derogatory’ language
description: DC Mark Luker used offensive language about Romas, Gypsies and Travellers in a WhatsApp group
content:
A police officer who was one of the first on the scene of the 2017 London Bridge terror attack has been sacked for gross misconduct after using “derogatory” language about Romas, Gypsies and Travellers.
